name: EUROTARGET, s.r.o.
goal:
The strategic objectives of EUROTARGET, s.r.o.
•Be a competent, trustworthy and reliable partner
•Be the first client´s choice
•A strong player on the Slovak market in the area of the consulting services and utilization EU funds
•Be a dynamic, modern and recognized company with the stable market share.
Quality policy
•Knowledge – experience – know-how: our activity is based on the quality professional knowledge, skills, experience and active
building of know-how. Our knowledge, skills and experience are helping us to find the right solution and to implement unique projects
for our clients.
•Persons: in the centre of our company are persons – clients, partners, employees, external assistants and contractors. Our company is
building long term relationship based on the personal trust, open communication, partnership and transfer of successful project
solution. High level knowledge and experience of employee is ensured by trainings and investments into the education.
•Quality: we consider quality as the success key because the quality brings clients, quality is also ensuring the efficiency, creates the
space for the innovations and new products.
•Sense: we perform activities which has sense and which are useful for our clients and usable in practise. It is the only way to achieve
sustainable growth of the client and company as well.
•Flexibility: our company constantly monitors the client´s needs and develop the solutions of his individual needs during the activity.
EUROTARGET, s.r.o. dispose with the stable team of internal employees and external collaborators which are renowned experts with
long-term practical and management experience in research, government and commercial banking activities, strategic management and
project management.
Employees dispose with long-term practical experiences in project processing which are co-finance from EU funds and other donor
sources, technical assistance during approved project implementation and also evaluation of the application and non-repayable
financial contribution provision of more operational programme managing authority´s needs.
Internal team is supplemented by appropriate of external expert capacity, with who has the company long-term practical experience of
the cooperation.
Also experts from IT and accounting belong to our external collaborators.
In the European Parliament (Brussels) has the company available office with the qualified staff for company and client´s needs.
Language skills of the employees are focused primarily on the Slovak language in the combination with the English language resp.
German language.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Services and activities of EUROTARGET, s.r.o.
-monitoring of legislative and political environment as well as of the policies and processes to meet the needs of its clients
-acquisition of relevant information on events within EU and the upcoming changes with a potential impact on the commercial
interests of a subject in advance, their analysis, mediation and solution proposal
-advocacy of their interests on the European niveau and realization of lobbing activities directly within the EU institutions, within the
relevant associations and unions by means of the company’s experienced lobbists, who have already been accredited by the European
Parliament for a longer period
-acquisition of direct information on the opportunities of financial support of the EU programmes and funds, marketing services for
clients in this area.
